#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int a[50],b[50];
int main()
{
    int test,i,cnt,ans,x,y;
    long long int n,num;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        num=n;
        i=0;cnt=0;
        while(n>0)
        {
            a[i]=n%2;
            i++;
            n=n/2;
            cnt++;
        }
        if(pow(2,cnt-1)==num)
        {
            printf("%d\n",cnt-2);
            continue;
        }
        b[0]=a[0];
        for(i=1;i<cnt;i++)
        b[i]=a[i]+b[i-1];
        ans=1000000;
        for(i=0;i<cnt;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]==0)
            continue;
            x=2*(b[i]-1)+i+1-b[i];
            y=2*(b[cnt-1]-b[i]-1)+cnt-(b[cnt-1]-b[i]);
            ans=min(ans,max(x,y));
        }
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
